articles.title: Foreign affairs minister to open consulate in Greenland today
articles.description: NUUK — Foreign Affairs Minister Anita Anand is set to officially open the new consulate today in Greenland’s capital of Nuuk, where Canadian consular staff have been operating quietly for several weeks.
